hero.title: About Sun Sea Tour
hero.subtitle: Crafting memorable journeys since our beginning

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Sun Sea Tour is a licensed Egyptian travel company, recognized by the Ministry of Tourism with a Class A license. Since our foundation, we have specialized in creating unforgettable travel experiences ‚Äî from cultural city breaks to seaside escapes, and from adventure-filled tours to spiritual journeys like Hajj and Umrah. We provide end-to-end services including visas, flights, accommodations, and personalized support from our dedicated experts.
story.p2: Today, Sun Sea Tour is trusted by travelers across Egypt and beyond for our professionalism, creativity, and care.

programsList.notes: The price is for a group
included: Admission to the marina is free to see the most beautiful yachts and boats.

Admission to the church, considered the oldest and largest church in Hurghada, is free.
Entrance to the fruit and vegetable market is free.

faq.title: Have Questions?
faq.subtitle: Here are some quick answers before you pack your bags

items.question: How can I book my dream trip?
items.answer: Booking is easy! Use our website, call our team, or drop us a message on WhatsApp or email ‚Äî we‚Äôll guide you every step of the way.

items.question: What‚Äôs included in the price?
items.answer: Our tours are designed to be stress-free: transport, stays, meals (as listed), expert guides, and activities ‚Äî all covered. No hidden surprises.

items.question: Can I design my own tour?
items.answer: Of course! Whether you want a romantic getaway, a family holiday, or an adventure-packed trip, we‚Äôll customize every detail for you.

items.question: What if I need to cancel?
items.answer: Life happens. That‚Äôs why our cancellation policies are flexible. Cancel up to 7 days before departure for a full refund ‚Äî no hassle.
